data.eml:eml: Elhamma Walker (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae) revisited: adult morphology, assessment of recently proposed synonyms and descriptions of two species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simonsen, Thomas J. (2015): Elhamma Walker (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae) revisited: adult morphology, assessment of recently proposed synonyms and descriptions of two species. Zootaxa 3955 (3): 301-328, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3955.3.1
